meanings.definition: A type of basketball shot where the shooter leans back while releasing the ball.
meanings.sent1: During the game, he made a fallaway shot from the corner of the court.
meanings.sent2: The basketball player practiced his fallaway technique to improve his shooting skills.
meanings.sent3: The coach joked that his fallaway shot was so good, it looked like he was dodging imaginary defenders.
meanings.sent4: Her fallaway shot was like a graceful dance move on the court, mesmerizing the audience.
meanings.sent5: The fallaway shot soared through the air, perfectly arcing towards the hoop.

meanings.definition: A type of dance move where the dancer leans back and falls away from their partner.
meanings.sent1: At the dance competition, she executed a flawless fallaway that impressed the judges.
meanings.sent2: During the tango, the couple performed a stunning fallaway that wowed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The dance instructor demonstrated the fallaway move with exaggerated flair, causing laughter in the class.
meanings.sent4: Her fallaway in the routine symbolized freedom and independence, adding depth to the performance.
meanings.sent5: The fallaway step added a touch of drama to the dance, creating a memorable moment on stage.

meanings.definition: A type of architectural design where a building or structure appears to be falling away from the viewer.
meanings.sent1: The artist's painting depicted a fallaway building that seemed to defy gravity.
meanings.sent2: The architectural marvel featured a stunning fallaway design that captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The tourists marveled at the optical illusion created by the fallaway structure.
meanings.sent4: The fallaway building in the artwork symbolized the passage of time and impermanence.
meanings.sent5: The fallaway perspective of the building gave the impression of movement and dynamism in the static image.
